name: RateX ils Plugin
author: ofek nakar

sections.description:
hey , this plugin provide shortcode [ratex-ils] that allow you to display ils currency convert to GBP , USD, EUR , BTC , CNY

you can find the short code in ratex ils panel on your left || right

A few notes about the sections above:

  • plugin use Vue.js a ui framework
  • the plugin fetch api data

A brief Example

steps:

  1. activate
  2. navigate to ratex ils
  3. copy & pasy the short code

Hello from ofek :), if there any need or request to add something or updates you can reach me via
Website whoisofek.in
Codepen SansOfek
Instagram ofek_nakar

RTX ILS Shortcode

[ratex-ils]
sections.faq:
where can i use the shortcode ?

you can use the shortcode anywhere , in widget, post etc…

What the convert amount ?

the converted amount is one to ILS example :1 EUR = 3.977 ILS
